public abstract class Person

public TimeFrameConstraint setValidTimeFrame(TimeFrame tf,

This makes this object visit the TimeFrameConstraints during scheduling.

Specified by:
setValidTimeFrame in interface Schedulable
Parameters:

tfContstraints - The constraints that must be satisfied.

The constraints for simpler code : schedulable.setValidTimeFrame(tf, tfc).acceptAll();.
